alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Dawes (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 5:44PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong line of thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Box Butte and eastern Dawes Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 444 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hemingford, or 19 miles northwest of Alliance, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chadron, Hemingford, Wild Horse Butte, Chadron Campground, Box Butte Campground, Red Cloud Campground, Berea, Chadron Airport, Box Butte Dam and Chadron St Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for the Panhandle of Nebraska.
